creator: qmax@mediasoft.ru
text:
RoleManager.getRole does not throw any exception, by interface definition.

In case one of roles could not be retrieved, it probuces unpredictable results,
very hard to track, especialy by users.

Test:
put unexistant role in policy file.

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
the new AC in 1.4 does have exception handlers in FileItemManager, so i'm
closing this. reopen if you disagree.
